channel.title: Flirting With Neutrality
channel.description: Recent content on Flirting With Neutrality

item.title: 'New on New'
item.author: peter.borocz@gmail.com (Péter Böröcz)
item.description: Examples of this abound: Pairing a brand new technology stack on a brand-new project (without adequate risk-management) Pairing a newly-hired employee under a newly-hired supervisor/manager. ‘New on new’ simply adds more risk than it’s worth.

item.title: Resume/CV
item.author: peter.borocz@gmail.com (Péter Böröcz)
item.description: …This is my resume… In particular, I’ve wanted to keep a detailed list of all the various positions I’ve held and projects I’ve participated in over my 35 year working history.

item.title: About
item.author: peter.borocz@gmail.com (Péter Böröcz)
item.description: My name is Péter Böröcz. I’m an actively retired technology manager and software developer. Detailed Background You can view my detailed resume/curriculm vitae here Content Content on this site is broken down into a few different sections based on my interests and activities: Writing Both short and long form commentary about current events, changes in the world since my early working days or projects I’m working on. Rides Select pictures and descriptions of my more memorable bike and bikepacking rides.

item.title: Site status!
item.author: peter.borocz@gmail.com (Péter Böröcz)
item.description: This site is currently under-development and is projected to come to fruition on mid-April 2021.
